name: Escape the Horde!
description:
Escape the Horde is a survival horror game with Minecraft style graphics, the player must explore the maze and find 3 keys whilst fighting off zombies. There will be health and ammo pickups and on-screen objectives that the player must achieve before they are able to escape the maze.

This game was made for a University Assignment, it is an Alpha version of the game and was refined due to deadlines. If you are interested and what to learn about the process of what I went through in creating this game, feel free to visit: https://escapethehordegame.blogspot.com/
